items.title: UnitedHealth Group Incorporated (UNH): “Medicare Fraud Is Prison,” Warns Jim Cramer
items.description: We recently published Jim Cramer’s Fresh 14 Stocks & Thoughts About Market Performance. UnitedHealth Group Incorporated (NYSE:UNH) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. UnitedHealth Group Incorporated (NYSE:UNH) is the largest healthcare benefits provider in America. It is also one of the worst-performing stocks in 2025 as the shares have lost 40% year-to-date. […]
